title: India's oil minister to visit Russia, Japan Oct. 22-26
text:
India's oil minister to visit Russia, Japan Oct. 22-26

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 20:12)

© Reuters. India's oil minister to visit Russia, Japan Oct. 22-26 NEW DELHI, Oct 21 (Reuters) - * India to discuss cooperation in coking coal, shipping sector with Russia during oil minister Dharmendra Pradhan's visit to Vladivostok during Oct. 22-25, a government statement said * India's state-owned Engineers India Ltd to sign a preliminary agreement with the Russian National Chamber of Engineers. * "The MoU will strengthen the symbolic bilateral energy cooperation as the technical expertise of both organisations will help EIL in providing its services for upcoming projects across the hydrocarbons value chain in Russia" the statement said. * During Oct. 25-26, the minister to meet with Japanese government and industry executives in Tokyo seeking tie-ups in energy and steel sectors.

India's oil minister to visit Russia, Japan Oct. 22-26
description: India's oil minister to visit Russia, Japan Oct. 22-26
